Package ru.postgrespro.perf.pgmicrobench.statanalyzer.multimodality

Class LowlandModalityDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.postgrespro.perf.pgmicrobench.statanalyzer.multimodality.LowlandModalityDetector
  • public class LowlandModalityDetector
extends Object
    LowlandModalityDetector class detects modality patterns from sample using density histogram.

    • Method Detail

      • detectModes

        public ModalityData detectModes​(WeightedSample sample)
        Detects modality data from given sample.
        Parameters:
        sample - input sample for modality detection.
        Returns:
        ModalityData containing detected modes and related data.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if sample is null or contains less than two unique elements.

      • detectModes

        public ModalityData detectModes​(@NonNull
                                @NonNull WeightedSample sample,
                                IDensityHistogramBuilder densityHistogramBuilder)
        Detects modality data from given sample using specified density histogram builder.
        Parameters:
        sample - input sample for modality detection.
        densityHistogramBuilder - builder for constructing density histogram.
        Returns:
        ModalityData containing detected modes and related data.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if sample is null or contains less than two unique elements.
